attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Adverse drug reaction (not a medication error/not preventable)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Other (for contrast reaction, see Radiology/imaging test)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Difficulty or trauma during tracheal intubation

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Reintubation, following extubation, in OR or recovery

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Problems with anesthesia, medical gas, or other substance

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Problems with device used in delivery of anesthesia

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: With other providers WITHIN patient care area

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: With other providers in OTHER patient care areas

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: With other providers in ancillary departments (e.g., laboratory, pharmacy, radiology)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Hemorrhage requiring unexpected transfusion or return to OR

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Respiratory failure requiring unplanned support < 24 hours after procedure

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Extravasation of vesicant drug (for extravasa- tion of radiologic contrast, see Radiology/imaging test)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Removal of tube or other medical device by patient

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Other catheter or tube problem (for self-/unplanned extubation, see Respiratory care)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Misconnection (e.g., wrong IV to wrong site/port)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Unplanned return to ED in 48 hours requiring admission

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Unexpected injury (not related to falls or skin integrity)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Artificial insemination with wrong donor sperm or wrong egg

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Injury related to spinal manipulative therapy

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Event related to surgery or invasive procedure

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Both burn and operating room fire

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Foreign body accidentally left in patient

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Incorrect implant because correct implant not available

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Colonization by antibiotic-resistant organism (e.g., MRSA, VRE)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Other type of infection (not involving surgical site) that developed during admission

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Eye, ear, nose, throat, or mouth

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Analysis of specimen in the laboratory

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Injury to body part or organ

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Wrong dosage form (e.g., sustained vs immediate release)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Wrong duration (of administration or course of therapy)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Incorrect patient action (e.g., self- administration error)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Five minute Apgar < 7 and birthweight> 2500 grams

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Monitoring issue or failure to monitor

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Abduction of a patient of any age

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Patient did not sign AMA form

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Patient discharged to the wrong person

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Discrepancy between ED interpretation of x-ray or EKG and final reading

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Specimen label missing, incomplete, or illegible

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Patient/product information on pickup slip does not match order

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Blood product administered with incorrect IV fluid

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Incorrect sequence of administration of products

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Incorrect use of expired or unacceptably stored products

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Incorrect volume (i.e., number of units or milliliters)

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Units not transfused within time frame per protocol

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Wrong product transfused (e.g., heterologous vs autologous blood)

attribute.name: name
